author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
This PR adds the realistic vertex smearing scenario for 2021 PilotBeams data.
 - The BeamSpot parameters are extracted from run [346512](https://cmsoms.cern.ch/cms/runs/report?cms_run=346512&cms_run_sequence=GLOBAL-RUN) (Fill [7531](https://cmsoms.cern.ch/cms/fills/report?cms_fill=7531)) using the ExpressPhysics FEVT dataset, the _legacy_ BS workflow, and refitting trks and PVs with the latest and greatest TkAlignment conditions.
 - The BPIX barycenter comes from [this twiki](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMS/TkAlignmentPixelPosition?rev=40#2021)

#### PR validation:
Code compiles

#### Backport:
Not a backport, a backport to 12_2_X is available in #36440

FYI @mmusich @dzuolo @lguzzi
title: Add VtxSmearing scenario for 2021 PilotBeams
